# Button

The m-button component replaces standard HTML buttons with material3 styled buttons.
MaterialVue contains these types of buttons:

  • filled
  • filled-tonal
  • outlined

# Basic usage

To create filled material button you can simply use MButton component

Button usage example

dark_modecode
<MButton>Label</MButton>

Label

# Button types

MaterialVue supports many types of buttons. Using the type prop, you can create buttons with different styles. type prop can be: filled, outlined, filled-tonal. By default, button is filled.

Button types example

dark_modecode
<MButton type="filled">I'm filled</MButton>
<MButton type="filled-tonal">I'm tonal</MButton>
<MButton type="outlined">I'm outlined</MButton>

I'm filled

I'm tonal

I'm outlined

# Enabled and disabled buttons

You can easily disable your button component by setting :enabled prop to false. By default, button is enabled.

Enable/Disable button example

dark_modecode
<MButton type="filled" :enabled="false">I'm filled</MButton>
<MButton type="filled-tonal">I'm tonal</MButton>
<MButton type="outlined">I'm outlined</MButton>

I'm filled

I'm tonal

I'm outlined
